reviewText: I like all of One Step Beyond.
LOVED IT SINCE I WAS A LITTLE KID.  SPOOKY SHOW
Print was ok to good and service excellent from Amazon.

Out of the four episodes featured I wasn't able to find the first two anywhere online for free the first one is dubbed House of the Dead which explains about a soldier looking for his fiance in Hong Kong and as a result the man had a encounter with the supernatural.

The second episode I was not able to find anywhere  else is called Forests of the Night in which three men are stuck in a remote cabin during a thunderstorm and they play a game that unleashes a curse.

Reminds me of the Evil Dead franchise could be it was based on this episode
Brought  for friend, was very happy with the delivery time, and condition that it was received, he has already asked me for the next volumes.

Not Hi-Def, but then, I guess that didn't exist back then. Quality is equal to or better than it was when I watched these back in the days of B/W TV and only 3 channels to choose from. If your a OSB fan this is a great buy.
